All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApplicationConfig
Configuration class providing beans for other classes related to authentication process
AuthenticationController
The controller for REST endpoints related to authentication.
AuthenticationRequest
Class that models data used to authenticate user
AuthenticationResponse
Class that models data sent to frontend with user data and JWT
AuthenticationService
Service class for encapsulating logic related to user creation and user authentication.
Comment
Class modeling Comment entity
CommentController
The controller for REST endpoints related to Comment entity.
CommentRepository
Repository class extending JpaRepository to manipulate Comment entity
CommentService
Service class for encapsulating logic related to getting and creating comments
ImprovementProposal
Class modeling ImprovementProposal entity
ImprovementProposalController
The controller for REST endpoints related to ImprovementProposal entity.
ImprovementProposalRepository
Repository class extending JpaRepository to manipulate ImprovementProposal entity
ImprovementProposalService
Service class for encapsulating logic related to manipulating improvement proposals
JwtAuthenticationFilter
 
JwtService
Class related to generating and extracting data from JWT
RecruitmentTask
Main class and entry point to Paymove Recruitment Task Application
RegisterRequest
Class that models data used to register user
Role
Class enumerating user's roles
SecurityConfig
Configuration class to configure security parameters: roles required to access various paths, cors etc.
User
Class modeling User entity
UserController
The controller for REST endpoints related to User entity.
UserRepository
Repository class extending JpaRepository to manipulate User entity
UserService
Service class for encapsulating logic related to manipulating users
